Package org.gradle.api.execution

Class TaskExecutionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradle.api.execution.TaskExecutionAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskExecutionListener
    public class TaskExecutionAdapter
extends Object
implements TaskExecutionListener
    A TaskExecutionListener adapter class for receiving task execution events. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as convenience for creating listener objects.

      • beforeExecute

        public void beforeExecute​(Task task)
        Description copied from interface: TaskExecutionListener
        This method is called immediately before a task is executed.
        Specified by:
        beforeExecute in interface TaskExecutionListener
        Parameters:
        task - The task about to be executed. Never null.

      • afterExecute

        public void afterExecute​(Task task,
                         TaskState state)
        Description copied from interface: TaskExecutionListener
        This method is called immediately after a task has been executed. It is always called, regardless of whether the task completed successfully, or failed with an exception.
        Specified by:
        afterExecute in interface TaskExecutionListener
        Parameters:
        task - The task which was executed. Never null.
        state - The task state. If the task failed with an exception, the exception is available in this state. Never null.
